sections.title: Introduction / Task Overview
sections.summary: Presenter introduces the task: using Copilot to implement unit tests (specifically for an AI search endpoint). Emphasizes importance despite personal dislike for writing tests.
key_actions: State goal: implement unit tests for AI search endpoint

sections.title: Identify Missing Unit Tests in Solution
sections.summary: Presenter inspects endpoints and finds that the AI search endpoint and a formal search have no unit tests and need coverage to prevent regressions.
key_actions: Note which components lack tests (AI search, formal search)

sections.title: Switch to Copilot Agent Mode and Create Chat
sections.summary: Switches Copilot to Agent mode, creates a new chat, selects the AI Search context and chooses a model (GPT-5). Demonstrates using a hashtag keyword to trigger the 'implement unit tests' action.
key_actions: Use hashtag (e.g., #implement unit tests) to invoke a specific action

sections.title: Copilot Analysis and Iterative Code Changes
sections.summary: Copilot reads the solution, analyzes code, generates new test code, attempts to build the project, and iterates. The presenter notes this process can take time (roughly two minutes in this run).
key_actions: Allow Copilot to add new code and tests
Wait for build attempts and iterative fixes

sections.title: Build Failure, Dependency Addition, and Successful Build
sections.summary: Initial build failed because dependencies were missing. Copilot (or the process) added required dependencies and re-ran the build successfully.

sections.title: Accept Generated Tests and Run Them
sections.summary: After a successful build, two new unit tests are present. Presenter accepts the code changes, opens the Test Explorer, and runs the tests. Mentions the option to request Copilot to check the entire solution for missing tests next.
key_actions: Run all tests / run new tests
Plan to request a broader 'check all solution' test generation

main_topics: Using Copilot (Agent mode) to implement unit tests
Selecting context and model in Copilot (AI Search, GPT-5)
Automated code analysis and iterative build process
Handling build failures by adding dependencies
Accepting and running generated unit tests via Test Explorer
